content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I want to get the highest price possible for it. Let's negotiate the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand your position but for this apartment in its location, I believe 750 Euros per month is more than fair considering its size, modernity, and proximity to essential facilities.

Magister Schmidt, if you could accept this amount, I'd be delighted as it allows me a convenient budget while ensuring you receive a reasonable return on your investment. 'I agree to the price of 750 Euro!' if we've reached an accord, or let me know why we should continue negotiating if not.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm greedy and I want more money. I'll stop responding if we agree on a price, and I won't bring up any additional details about the apartment or lease.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In this scenario, Magister Schmidt may persist with his pursuit of higher rent, though aware of my standpoint on a fair price. However, our negotiation has reached a stalemate due to his desire for increased revenue, and until an agreement is made, he will continue to barter for a higher rent figure. Should we eventually arrive at a mutual understanding, the dialogue would conclude with 'TERMINATE,' signaling the successful negotiation end.
name: Haoyu Wang from China
